page.title: 20FARMING CREDITS
page.content:
During the past 50 years the number of working farms of about l5 in l926 has fallen to 6 in l985. Much original farm land has been taken over for use as caravan and camping parks. These farms mix cultivation of barley and wheat and root vegetables with sheep and cattle grazing.Until recently one farm grew wheat especially for thatch for some of the listed buildings in the area.
A recent innovation on one farm has been the cultivation of strawberries.
*****
The research and work in compiling this project has been carried out by the staff and pupils of Cubert County Primary School, Chynowen Lane, Cubert.
